sentences.english: He gave Powell secretary of state and then began to box him up.
sentences.chinese: 他給了鮑威爾國務卿的位子，然後開始捆住他的手腳。

sentences.english: Chinese State Councilor Ma Kai has recently concluded his visit to the EU headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，馬凱國務委員成功訪問歐盟總部。

sentences.english: Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 本細則由國務院環境保護部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: Is the artist at the national level, enjoy State Council special benefit.
sentences.chinese: 系國家一級美術師，享受國務院特殊津貼。

sentences.english: For registered mail, compensation shall be made according to standard amounts formulated by the competent department of postal services under the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 掛號信件，按照國務院郵政主管部門規定的金額賠償。

sentences.english: Secretary of State Condoleezza Rice squeezed in some ice time while in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 在俄羅斯美國國務卿賴斯擠出一些時間在冰場上。

sentences.english: The state Department approved Shenzhen city to be a coastal, economic open zone.
sentences.chinese: 國務院批准深圳爲沿海經濟開放城市。

sentences.english: This afternoon, State Councilor Dai Bingguo will meet with him.
sentences.chinese: 今天下午戴秉國國務委員也將會見他。

sentences.english: The State Department is simply not equipped to handle interdepartmental machinery.
sentences.chinese: 國務院根本不具備駕馭部際機構的能力。

sentences.english: Tense negotiations were under way in the State Department conference room.
sentences.chinese: 在國務院會議廳裏，正進行着激烈的協商。

sentences.english: State Councilor Tang Jiaxuan and other Chinese companions attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 國務委員唐家璇等中方陪同人員參加會見。

sentences.english: In July, Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton challenged China over its claims to wide areas of the South China Sea.
sentences.chinese: 七月，國務卿希拉蕊挑戰南海主權上挑戰中國。

sentences.english: Article 32. Environmental protection departments under the State Council shall be held responsible for the interpretation of This Bylaw .
sentences.chinese: 第三十二條本細則由國務院環境保護部門負責解釋。

sentences.english: He is a national important contribution expert and is granted a Special Allowance from the State Council.
sentences.chinese: 國家級有突出貢獻專家，國務院特殊津貼獲得者。

sentences.english: In 2005, he was approved to receive the State Council special allowance.
sentences.chinese: 2005年被批准享受國務院特殊津貼。

sentences.english: Jiang Zhigang was appointed Vice-Chairman of State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration.
sentences.chinese: 姜志剛任國務院國有資產監督管理委員會副主任。
